===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいり}} {{m|zh|海里|tr=xoj<sup>X</sup> li<sup>X</sup>|lit=sea, ocean + unit of distance}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''hǎilǐ''.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいり}}

# a [[nautical mile]]: the [[length]] of roughly one [[minute]] of [[latitude]], 1,852 [[meter]]s
